import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { detailUpdater } from '../../actions'; class Detail extends Component { state = { page: false, firstName: this.props.user.firstname, lastName: this.props.user.lastname, userName: this.props.user.username, email: this.props.user.email, password: '', password2: '', phoneNumber: this.props.user.phoneNumber, whatsAppNumber: this.props.user.whatsAppNumber, city: this.props.user.city, state: this.props.user.state, pinCode: this.props.user.pinCode, }; onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { firstName, lastName, email, userName, phoneNumber, whatsAppNumber, city, state, password, password2, pinCode, } = this.state; const newDetails = { firstName, lastName, email, userName, phoneNumber, whatsAppNumber, city, state, password, password2, pinCode, }; this.props.detailUpdater(newDetails); }; render() { const { firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, pinCode, state, city, userName, whatsAppNumber, } = this.state; return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ success: state.auth.success, user: state.auth.user.user, verified: state.auth.user.verified, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { detailUpdater })(Detail);
